Table	Create Table
subjectEnrollments	CREATE TABLE `subjectEnrollments` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `studentId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `subjectId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `enrolledAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('active','completed','dropped') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_enrollment` (`studentId`,`subjectId`,`userId`),
  KEY `fk_2` (`subjectId`),
  KEY `fk_3` (`userId`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`studentId`) REFERENCES `c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6`.`students` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`subjectId`) REFERENCES `c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6`.`subjects` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=510001
